verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: says] [ARG1: his deal with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un will save tens of millions of people from a potential nuclear war . Now he just has to get everyone else on board] .
President Donald Trump says his deal with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un [V: will] save tens of millions of people from a potential nuclear war . Now he just has to get everyone else on board .

President Donald Trump says [ARG0: his deal with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: save] [ARG1: tens of millions of people] [ARG2: from a potential nuclear war] . Now he just has to get everyone else on board .

President Donald Trump says his deal with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un will save tens of millions of people from a potential nuclear war . [ARGM-TMP: Now] he [ARGM-DIS: just] [V: has] to get everyone else on board .

President Donald Trump says his deal with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un will save tens of millions of people from a potential nuclear war . Now [ARG0: he] just has to [V: get] [ARG1: everyone else on board] .
